localised_description.last_approved_text: You can only field so many armies at once, this can be increased by ranking up and unlocking reforms.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Improved diplomatic relations will lead to better deals and less aggression from other factions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The speed at which you complete reforms will speed up the rate of your faction's development.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Trade influence determines income from a trade agreement. The faction with the higher trade influence will receive a higher portion of the agreed deal.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Trade influence determines income from a trade agreement. The faction with the higher trade influence will receive a higher portion of the agreed deal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Income from trade greatly depends on the total volume of trade between two factions. The volume is the sum of both factions' total income, plus any additional production.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Income from trade greatly depends on the total volume of trade between two factions. The volume is the sum of both factions' total income, plus any additional production.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Yuan Shao's Lineage gives him benefits to character recruitment and post-siege options.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Higher population provides bonuses to peasantry income and replenishment. At higher levels, however, it can cause public order issues.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Higher population provides bonuses to peasantry income and replenishment. At higher levels, however, it can cause public order issues.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: With increased conscription, additional population will be drafted into the military.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Densely-populated settlements will lose population as people migrate into the surrounding counties.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Densely-populated settlements will lose population as people migrate into the surrounding counties.

localised_description.last_approved_text: {{tr:info_mode_prestige}} determines your standing in the world and will increase the rank of your faction.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: {{tr:info_mode_prestige}} determines your standing in the world and will increase the rank of your faction.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Agricultural garrisons are troops stationed in vital economic regions in order to defend them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Attrition slowly saps at the strength of an army, gradually depleting their numbers.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Attrition slowly saps at the strength of an army, gradually depleting their numbers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Buildings can require maintenance cost to be payed as upkeep per-turn.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Buildings can require maintenance cost to be payed as upkeep per-turn.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As characters gain experience, they will rank up, gaining access to new skills and abilities.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: As characters gain experience, they will rank up, gaining access to new skills and abilities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The faster your settlements are constructed, the faster your faction will develop.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: The faster your settlements are constructed, the faster your faction will develop.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Corruption is the loss of income due to the size of your realm to various, insalubrious elements of society.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Corruption is the loss of income due to the size of your realm to various, insalubrious elements of society.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Producing and maintaining a healthy food supply is vital to keep settlements growing and well-supplied.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Reserves are required for a settlement to endure a long siege.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Provides the ability to recruit mercenaries. Mercenaries are units that instantly muster at full strength.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Provides the ability to recruit mercenaries. Mercenaries are units that instantly muster at full strength.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Population growth drives the expansion of your settlements, allowing them to develop and become more useful.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Population growth drives the expansion of your settlements, allowing them to develop and become more useful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Increasing {{tr:public_order}} is crucial for maintaining civil order in growing settlements. If it gets too low, the populace will rebel.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Causes civil unrest in adjacent enemy {{tr:map_Provinces}}. If public order becomes too low, it will trigger a rebellion.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Causes civil unrest in adjacent enemy {{tr:map_Provinces}}. If public order becomes too low, it will trigger a rebellion.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Artisans enable the development of certain resource settlements to higher levels.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Increases your defences against enemy spy actions.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Increases your defences against enemy spy actions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Provides additional reserves for your stockpile in this {{tr:map_province}}.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Provides additional reserves for your stockpile in this {{tr:map_province}}.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Reserves are required for a settlement to endure a long siege, and for increasing military supplies of local armies. This increases the maximum that can be stored.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Reserves are required for a settlement to endure a long siege, and for increasing military supplies of local armies. This increases the maximum that can be stored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The better weapons your citizenry have, the greater their chance of victory against aggressors.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: The better weapons your citizenry have, the greater their chance of victory against aggressors.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A garrison army cannot be moved from the settlement, but will provide defence when the enemy attacks.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: A garrison army cannot be moved from the settlement, but will provide defence when the enemy attacks.

localised_description.last_approved_text: New reforms and areas of study are vital to grow your faction and increase your power.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: New reforms and areas of study are vital to grow your faction and increase your power.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Each character has a post that requires a salary. Promoting them, and increasing their salary, will improve their satisfaction.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Each character has a post that requires a salary. Promoting them, and increasing their salary, will improve their satisfaction.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Each commandery capital has building slots, which will increase as you upgrade the settlement. From each slot, you can choose to construct buildings and develop your settlement.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Each commandery capital has building slots, which will increase as you upgrade the settlement. From each slot, you can choose to construct buildings and develop your settlement.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This reduces construction cost of other buildings. This can help to provide a boost to infrastructural improvements - and even temporary bonuses can be worth hit.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: This reduces construction cost of other buildings. This can help to provide a boost to infrastructural improvements - and even temporary bonuses can be worth hit.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Buildings in each district will reduce the cost of constructing buildings in another district. Seek out these harmonies to maximise the potential of your settlements.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Walls are the first line of defence in a siege, providing a formidable barrier for the enemy to overcome.

effects_generalised_descriptions.localised_description: Walls are the first line of defence in a siege, providing a formidable barrier for the enemy to overcome.
